company: Regents of the University of California
job description:
Under general supervision of a Senior Supervisor Clinical Lab Technologist, perform independently a wide variety of technical procedures in Serology. Other responsibilities include method development-modification-parallel testing, collaboration on or independent preparation of abstracts or manuscripts, maintenance repair of laboratory instruments, sample processing, reagent preparation, and data entry. On a daily basis, assess overall workload for any area that needs help and assist co-workers without being reassigned by the supervisor.

*This position is based in the Brentwood Microbiology Laboratory
